name: Cyberdeck
description:
The game is in a prototype state, there is roughly 30 minutes of content

Cyberdeck is a dungeon crawler with a card combat system set on a failing space station. You fill the role of an engineer on the station with the decision to abandon the station or try to save it. Throughout the game you will experience fast paced combat encounters, and be presented with moral dilemmas that will make you weigh up the implications of your actions.
